question: What are the dimensions and weight limits for your 32ft containers?
answer:
We offer two 32ft container options:
• SXL: 32'L x 9'W x 10'H (9,000kg max)
• MXL: 32'L x 9'W x 10'H (16,000-25,000kg max)
Both feature reinforced floors and high cube options.

question: How do I prepare heavy machinery for transport in open vehicles?
answer:
Key preparation steps:
1) Drain all fluids to 1/4 tank
2) Secure loose parts
3) Provide weight distribution specs
4) Our team will handle specialized tie-downs and permits

question: What's the lead time for container delivery?
answer: Standard delivery within 48 hours for urban areas. For specialized containers (32ft/MXL) or rural locations, please allow 3-5 business days for scheduling.

question: Are your containers weatherproof during transit?
answer: All enclosed containers are CSC certified with wind/water tight seals. Open vehicles include optional tarpaulin covers for weather protection.

question: Can I track my shipment in real-time?
answer: Yes! All shipments include GPS tracking with 24/7 monitoring. You'll receive a unique tracking link and regular status updates via email/SMS.

question: What certifications do your containers have?
answer:
Our fleet meets all international standards:
• CSC safety plates
• ISO 1496 certification
• Annual structural integrity inspections
